subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: As someone who has attended university, I was used to the impersonal teaching methods that made me feel more like a number than a person.

subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: From the experiences others had at Camosun College, it sounded like a community-oriented school that helps you exceed your goals.

subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: This level of support and community became essential to Sydney’s studies as she struggled with her decision to pursue the Interactive Media Developer program.

subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: There were others around me with years of previous coding experience.

subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: As someone completely new to a technological program and coding altogether, I constantly felt overshadowed by the prior experience of my classmates.

subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: It was the encouragement and support from her instructors that got her through the self-doubt.

subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: Every instructor is motivated to help you succeed.

subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: From staying late after class to help me understand a new concept or letting me shed a couple of tears in their office, it felt as though all of my instructors were invested in my success.

subject: Sydney Muncaster
object: You’re surrounded by people who genuinely care about your success and well-being.
